name: Rhythm Of Arrows
description:
"Rhythm Of Arrows" is a complete rhythm game, bringing together a panoply of rap duels. So you will have several mods, each with a different story and main player. The goal of the game is to win the musical competitions, and this, by scoring as many notes as possible at the exact moment, in order to increase the score and win the duels.
You will also have an entertaining scratch pictures game and very funny sound effects.

Features of the game:
- About thirty tracks,
- Several main player,
- Convenient game (Buttons),
- Multiple Weeks (Levels),
- Different opponents.

Have fun and don't forget to leave your feedback to improve the game.
